TopicTitle: Planning 3 day KSP stream and need input

Articles.Content:
So this coming weekend I want to do a 72 hour stream of KSP where I do a full science run in Career Mode. My goal is to have no reloads, try not to kill any Kerbals, and have most of my mission (more then 80%) have a Kerbal go somewhere and back.

What do you guys think?
